```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(dplyr)
library(gt)
library(here)
library(readr)
library(tidyr)

knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  cache = FALSE,
  dpi=200,
  echo = TRUE,
  fig.align = 'center',
  fig.height=9.6,
  fig.retina=1.5,
  fig.width=9.6
)
```


```{r helper-functions}
load_natality_data <- function(year) {
  read_csv(
    here(paste0('data/NVSS/natality', year, 'us.csv')),
    col_select = c('datayear', 'stsubocc', 'mage8'),
    col_types = 'nnf'
  ) |> mutate(
    mage8 = factor(
      mage8,
      levels = 1:8,
      labels = c(
        "Under 15 years",
        "15-19 years",
        "20-24 years",
        "25-29 years",
        "30-34 years",
        "35-39 years",
        "40-44 years",
        "45-49 years"
      )
    )
  )
}

count_natality_levels <- function(tbl, year, variable_name) {
  tbl |>
    group_by(get(variable_name)) |>
    count() |>
    ungroup() |>
    mutate(
      Year = year,
      Variable = variable_name,
      .before = everything()
    )
}

summarize_natality_year <- function(tbl, year) {
  bind_rows(
    tbl |>
      group_by(datayear) |>
      count() |>
      ungroup() |>
      mutate(
        Year = year,
        Variable = 'datayear',
        .before = everything()
      ),
    tbl |>
      group_by(stsubocc) |>
      count() |>
      ungroup() |>
      mutate(
        Year = year,
        Variable = 'stsubocc',
        .before = everything()
      ),
    tbl |>
      group_by(mage8) |>
      count() |>
      ungroup() |>
      mutate(
        Year = year,
        Variable = 'mage8',
        .before = everything()
      )
  )
}

process_natality_year <- function(year) {
  summarize_natality_year(
    load_natality_data(year),
    year
  )
}
```


```{r processing-of-data}
years <- 1994:1974

natality_data <- Map(process_natality_year, years)

combined_natality_tbl <- Reduce(bind_rows, natality_data, tibble())
```


```{r check-of-datayear}
combined_natality_tbl |>
  filter(Variable == 'datayear') |>
  select(Year, datayear, n) |>
  gt() |>
  fmt_number(n, decimal = 0)
```


```{r check-of-stsubocc}
combined_natality_tbl |>
  filter(Variable == 'stsubocc') |>
  select(Year, stsubocc, n) |>
  pivot_wider(
    names_from = Year,
    values_from = n
  ) |>
  gt() |>
  fmt_number(decimal = 0)
```


```{r check-of-mage8}
combined_natality_tbl |>
  filter(Variable == 'mage8') |>
  select(Year, mage8, n) |>
  pivot_wider(
    names_from = Year,
    values_from = n
  ) |>
  gt() |>
  fmt_number(decimal = 0)
```


```{r saving-to-Rds}
combined_natality_tbl |>
  filter(Variable == 'mage8') |>
  select(Year, mage8, n) |>
  saveRDS(here('data/NVSS/natality_by_age_1974-1994us.Rds'))
```
